answers.answer: oh where, oh where could she beeeeeeeee???    I havent heard a word but Im sure she is busy with those boys of hers!   Teenager are the best.  Pains at times but I have two of my own and a whole classroom full too.I was just leaving work at about 5:30 this evening when two of them knocked on my classroom window.  "We told our football coach we quit and he could kiss are arse since he cant call a foul when he sees it".................................so, I guess tomorrows morning issue to work out is laid out for me already...LOL!!!

And I thought I wanted to be a teacher.  Glad it was your calling and not mine.  I have two teenage boys too. Jon is 18 and lives with his dad for the first time (I miss him so much), and David is 16 and lives with me and Sally.  He has juvenile type 1 diabetes so besides being a typical teen, we have that to contend with as well.  Still wouldn't trade them for the world though.night, sweet lady.  talk to you tomorrow.love,Debs
nighty nite.  my boys are 19 (lives with dad) and 14 split between me and his dad.luv the heck outta themhugstzt
heard from my sweet swany.  will be keeping in touch.  she is just off and on with the computer but I am so glad she is okay.Just wanted to let you know.Deb

question: Has anyone heard from her???  She sent me a message a few days ago and I know she is under a lot of pressure, so I was wondering if anyone had heard from her???Thanks
title: Where o where could swany be?
